actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

• Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (3 slots): bless, cure wounds, sanctuary

actions.name: Lightning Jolt
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d6) lightning damage, and the target is affected by Contagious Lightning.

reactions.name: Ride the Bolt
reactions.desc: The azza gremlin can travel instantly along any bolt of lightning. When it is within 5 feet of a lightning effect, the azza can teleport to any unoccupied space inside or within 5 feet of that lightning effect.

special_abilities.name: Contagious Lightning
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the azza gremlin or hits it with a melee attack using a metal weapon receives a discharge of lightning. The creature must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or attract lightning for 1 minute. For the duration, attacks that cause lightning damage have advantage against this creature, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws against lightning damage and lightning effects, and if the creature takes lightning damage, it is paralyzed until the end of its next turn. An affected creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Improvised Weapon
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, depending on weapon.

special_abilities.name: Clurichaun's Luck
special_abilities.desc: Clurichauns add both their Dexterity and Charisma modifiers to their Armor Class.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the clurichaun's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The clurichaun can cast the following spells, requiring only alcohol as a component.

at will: friends, mending, minor illusion, purify food and drink, vicious mockery

1/day each: blur, calm emotions, heroism, sleep, suggestion

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The clurichaun has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Living Wick
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, unconscious
monsters.senses: sight 20 ft. (blind beyond the radius of its own light), passive Perception 10
monsters.languages: shares a telepathic link with the individual that lit its wick

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Consume Self
actions.desc: A living wick can be commanded to rapidly burn through the remains of its wick, creating a devastating fireball. All creatures within 20 feet of the living wick take 7 (2d6) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. The fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried. The wick is reduced to a lifeless puddle of wax.

special_abilities.name: Controlled
special_abilities.desc: Living wicks cannot move, attack, or perform actions when they are not lit. Living wicks only respond to the telepathic commands of the individual that lit them.

special_abilities.name: Light
special_abilities.desc: Activated living wicks produce light as a torch.

special_abilities.name: Melting
special_abilities.desc: A living wick loses one hit point for every 24 hours it remains lit.

monsters.name: Pseudodragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13
monsters.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

special_abilities.name: Keen Senses
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Limited Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 ft. of it that can understand a language.

special_abilities.name: Variant: Familiar
special_abilities.desc: The pseudodragon can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the pseudodragon senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the pseudodragon is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the pseudodragon's Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the pseudodragon can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The ramag has advantage on saving throws against spells or other magical effects.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Nimbleness
special_abilities.desc: The ratfolk can move through the space of any creature size Medium or larger.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The ratfolk has advantage on its attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ratfolk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally is capable of attacking.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Roachling Skirmisher
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 10 ft., passive Perception 9

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Resistant
special_abilities.desc: The roachling skirmisher has advantage on Constitution saving throws.

special_abilities.name: Unlovely
special_abilities.desc: The skirmisher has disadvantage on Performance and Persuasion checks in interactions with nonroachlings.

monsters.name: Skeleton
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Swarm of Bats
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 5 (2d4) piercing damage, or 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

monsters.name: Swarm of Rats
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

monsters.name: Swarm of Ravens
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Beaks
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Reshape
actions.desc: The treacle assumes the shape of any tiny creature or object. A reshaped treacle gains the movement of its new form but no other special qualities.

actions.name: Blood Drain (1/hour)
actions.desc: A treacle touching the skin of a warm-blooded creature inflicts 4 (1d8) necrotic damage per hour of contact, and the victim's maximum hit points are reduced by the same number. Blood is drained so slowly that the victim doesn't notice the damage unless he or she breaks contact with the treacle (sets it down or hands it to someone else, for example). When contact is broken, the victim notices blood on his or her skin or clothes with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Perception) check.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: The treacle can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Charming Presence
special_abilities.desc: The treacle has an uncanny ability to sense and to play off of another creature's emotions. It uses Charisma (Deception) to oppose Wisdom (Insight or Perception) skill checks made to see through its ruse, and it has advantage on its check.

monsters.name: Zombie
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.
